active_learning.discussion_prompt: Given a limited budget and an ongoing ransomware attack affecting critical systems, debate whether to allocate more resources to immediate containment or thorough forensics investigation. Consider trade-offs in recovery time, legal implications, and future prevention using NIST SP 800-61 Rev. 3 guidelines. Justify positions with real-world examples.

active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
